content: with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 pulling through cc instead of mc fasten_off mc 108 double_crochet 12 ch2 sps round 12 with cc ch1 2 single_crochet in same st as slip_stitch and single_crochet in next 12 double_crochet 3 single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next 12 double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next double_crochet ch1 *2 single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next 12 double_crochet 3 single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next 12 double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next double_crochet ch1* repeat from * to * 3 times join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 124 single_crochet 4 ch1 sps round 13 ch1 single_crochet in same st as slip_stitch single_crochet in next 14 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 15 single_crochet slip_stitch in next chain *single_crochet in next 15 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 15 single_crochet slip_stitch in next chain* join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet fasten_off and weave in all ends 132 single_crochet *page 8*
